front.title: Layer Two Tunneling Protocol (L2TP) over AAL5 and FUNI

abstract.t: Layer Two Tunneling Protocol describes a mechanism to tunnel PPP sessions. The protocol has been designed to be independent of the media it runs over. The base specification describes how it should be implemented to run over UDP and IP. This document describes how the Layer Two Tunneling Protocol MUST be implemented over ATM (AAL5 and FUNI).
